data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are so many people that I love and adore, but one person I would love to meet someday is Scarlett Johansson. She is the most successful Hollywood actress of our times. She entered Hollywood when she was a teenager, and she has by far swept us by her amazing acting. Her films have grossed over $14.3 billion worldwide. The reason I want to meet her is that she has taught so many people, in so many ways, that if one is ready to work hard on their dreams, the world is all theirs, and there is nothing in this world that is unachievable, and one should never stop. Not only is she amazing at her work, but she has also been associated with a lot of philanthropy work that helps people around the world in education and better living facilities. (142 字)
data.referenceText: Who is a famous person you would like to meet one day? What are they known for, and why do you want to meet them?
data.referenceTranslate: 你希望能见到哪个名人？他们以什么出名，你为什么想要见他们？
